author: Cory Bonini
title: Week 4 Fantasy QB Rankings
text:
It has been a rough start to 2025 for the positionâ€™s player pool. As it stands midweek, we have six different quarterbacks who entered the year as a backup slated to start. That number could shrink if injured players, such as Brock Purdy, Justin Fields, and/or Jayden Daniels, are able to get right in time.
Veteran fantasy football expert Cory Bonini will publish and update free fantasy football PPR rankings with tiers throughout the season. He also has your back for working the waiver wire, playing the right sleepers, avoiding lineup-killing busts, navigating injuries, cashing prop bets, and more!
Fantasy Football Scoring Format
- 0.1 point per rushing yard
- 6 points per rushing TD
- 0.05 points per passing yard
- 4 points per passing TD
- -1 point per interception thrown
Also see: Quarterbacks | Running backs | Wide receivers | Tight ends | Kickers | Defenses
Week 4 Fantasy QB Rankings
*Denotes game played in Dublin
Green: Player moved up in the latest rankings update.
Red: Player moved down in the latest rankings update.
